item.title: Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) Explained
item.description: Radar Basic Concepts Down Looking vs. Side Looking Down Looking不能区分距离一样的a，b点 Simplified explanation of Radar working & What is SAR The radar consists fundamentally of a transmitter, a receiver, an antenna and an electronic system to process and record the data.
